document.full_text: canon will likely report an 8 percent fall in first-quarter operating profit and lower its full-year forecast, reflecting the impact from japan's devastating earthquake, the nikkei newspaper reported on friday.
document.title: canon q1 operating profit to fall, forecast to be cut: report
lines_and_colors: canon will likely report an 8 percent fall in first-quarter operating profit and lower its full-year forecast, reflecting the impact from japan's devastating earthquake, the nikkei newspaper reported on friday.
